con:configuration.scriptText: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Customer Login").getPropertyValue("Response") def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def Token = holder.accessToken log.info Token context.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Auth","bearer "+Token) context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Auth","bearer "+Token)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Customer Login").getPropertyValue("Response") def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def Token = holder.accessToken log.info Token context.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Auth","bearer "+Token) context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Auth","bearer "+Token)
